verses.verse: The Revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to him, to show <S%G1166><s%> to his servants <S%G1401><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> shortly <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5034><s%> come <S%G1096><s%> to pass; and he sent <S%G649><s%> and signified <S%G4591><s%> it by his angel <S%G32><s%> to his servant <S%G1401><s%> John: <S%G2491><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> bore <S%G3140><s%> record <S%G3140><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and of the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and of all <S%G3745><s%> things that he saw. <S%G1492><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he that reads, <S%G314><s%> and they that hear <S%G191><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of this <S%G3588><s%> prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> and keep <S%G5083><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> things which are written <S%G1125><s%> therein: <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> for the time <S%G2540><s%> is at hand. <S%G1451><s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> to the seven <S%G2033><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in Asia: <S%G773><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be to you, and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from him which <S%G3588><s%> is, and which <S%G3588><s%> was, and which <S%G3588><s%> is to come; <S%G2064><s%> and from the seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are before <S%G1799><s%> his throne; <S%G2362><s%>

And from Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who is the faithful <S%G4103><s%> witness, <S%G3144><s%> and the first <S%G4416><s%> begotten <S%G4416><s%> of the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and the prince <S%G758><s%> of the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%> To him that loved <S%G25><s%> us, and washed <S%G3068><s%> us from our sins <S%G266><s%> in his own <S%G848><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%>

And has made <S%G4160><s%> us kings <S%G935><s%> and priests <S%G2409><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> and his Father; <S%G3962><s%> to him be glory <S%G1391><s%> and dominion <S%G2904><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> he comes <S%G2064><s%> with clouds; <S%G3507><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> shall see <S%G3700><s%> him, and they also which <S%G3748><s%> pierced <S%G1574><s%> him: and all <S%G3956><s%> kindreds <S%G5443><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> shall wail <S%G2875><s%> because <S%G1909><s%> of him. Even <S%G3483><s%> so, <S%G3483><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

I am <S%G1510><s%> Alpha <S%G1><s%> and Omega, <S%G5598><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> and the ending , <S%G5056><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is, and which <S%G3588><s%> was, and which <S%G3588><s%> is to come, <S%G2064><s%> the Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>

I John, <S%G2491><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> am your <S%G5216><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> and companion <S%G4791><s%> in tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> and in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> and patience <S%G5281><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> was in the isle <S%G3520><s%> that is called <S%G2564><s%> Patmos, <S%G3963><s%> for the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and for the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I was in the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the Lord's <S%G2960><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> and heard <S%G191><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> me a great <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> as of a trumpet, <S%G4536><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> Alpha <S%G1><s%> and Omega, <S%G5598><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> and the last: <S%G2078><s%> and, What <S%G3739><s%> you see, <S%G991><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> in a book, <S%G975><s%> and send <S%G3992><s%> it to the seven <S%G2033><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in Asia; <S%G773><s%> to Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> and to Smyrna, <S%G4667><s%> and to Pergamos, <S%G4010><s%> and to Thyatira, <S%G2363><s%> and to Sardis, <S%G4554><s%> and to Philadelphia, <S%G5359><s%> and to Laodicea. <S%G2993><s%>

And I turned <S%G1994><s%> to see <S%G991><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> that spoke <S%G2980><s%> with me. And being turned, <S%G1994><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> candlesticks; <S%G3087><s%>

And in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%> one like <S%G3664><s%> to the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> clothed <S%G1746><s%> with a garment <S%G4158><s%> down to the foot, <S%G4158><s%> and girt <S%G4024><s%> about <S%G4024><s%> the breasts <S%G3149><s%> with a golden <S%G5552><s%> girdle. <S%G2223><s%>

His head <S%G2776><s%> and his hairs <S%G2359><s%> were white <S%G3022><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> wool, <S%G2053><s%> as white <S%G3022><s%> as snow; <S%G5510><s%> and his eyes <S%G3788><s%> were as a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire; <S%G4442><s%>

And his feet <S%G4228><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> to fine brass, <S%G5474><s%> as if they burned <S%G4448><s%> in a furnace; <S%G2575><s%> and his voice <S%G5456><s%> as the sound <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> waters. <S%G5204><s%>

And he had <S%G2192><s%> in his right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> stars: <S%G792><s%> and out of his mouth <S%G4750><s%> went <S%G1607><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> two edged <S%G1366><s%> sword: <S%G4501><s%> and his countenance <S%G3799><s%> was as the sun <S%G2246><s%> shines <S%G5316><s%> in his strength. <S%G1411><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> him, I fell <S%G4098><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> his feet <S%G4228><s%> as dead. <S%G3498><s%> And he laid <S%G2007><s%> his right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> on me, saying <S%G3004><s%> to me, Fear <S%G5399><s%> not; I am <S%G1510><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> and the last: <S%G2078><s%>

I am <S%G1510><s%> he that lives, <S%G2198><s%> and was dead; <S%G3498><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> for ever more, <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> Amen; <S%G281><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> the keys <S%G2807><s%> of hell <S%G86><s%> and of death. <S%G2288><s%>
Write <S%G1125><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> you have seen, <S%G1492><s%> and the things which <S%G3739><s%> are, and the things which <S%G3739><s%> shall be hereafter; <S%G3326><s%>

The mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> in my right <S%G1188><s%> hand, and the seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> candlesticks. <S%G3087><s%> The seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> are the angels <S%G32><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> churches: <S%G1577><s%> and the seven <S%G2033><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> are the seven <S%G2033><s%> churches. <S%G1577><s%>
